review.title: Bad experience
review.reviewText: This is the first bad experience I had with Homewood hotels in USA.

review.title: Nice hotel in the middle of nowhere!
review.reviewText:
We stayed for a week to visit San Francisco and vicinity.  This hotel was very nice, clean and the property was well kept.  It had free breakfast everyday and free evening "dinner" Mon thru Thurs.  The staff was very nice, and so were the other guests.  The air conditioning was very quiet, and the bed were comfortable.  There was no restaurant in the hotel.  If you wanted a meal, other than the free meals, you had to walk across the way to the next door hotel.  It is located about 15 minutes to San Francisco and about 10 minutes to the airport.

The view from our room was of Route 101, an exit ramp, and CALTRAIN tracks.

Keep in mind that if you stay here, you are going to need a car.  Also, there is a lot of traffic in SF, and wherever you go, you are going to wait on long, slow lines.  

Other than that, we had a good time.
review.positiveRemarks: It provided everything we needed during our stay.
review.negativeRemarks:
The pool area was lame.  It had no seats or tables, not even a snack bar.
If you forgot a toiletry, you need to drive to CVS to get it.
review.locationRemarks: This hotel is located in the middle of nowhere.  There is nothing to walk to.  You are going to need a car.

review.title: Good location for airport
review.reviewText:
Suite was perfect for family of 6 
Breakfast was good

review.title: breakfast
review.reviewText: The free breakfast never went well. Not enough food for all the people that were there to eat. Definitely need to change that if that is going to be considered an amenity and a reason to stay there.

review.title: Excellent view at Marina a block .
review.reviewText:
I have traveled all over the United States,and stayed at great hotels.
The staff hospitality was on par with the Waldorf in New York.
Excellent value and location for the price
Close to all freeways,take the coastal drive on Ca 1 South and Ca 1 North,if Muir Woods is full you can see Redwoods along Ca1 North.
Napa Valley and Sacramento are close for the day.
Also take Grey Line for 2 day hop on hop off,as well as their Alcatraz and Bridge water tour, great way to see San Francisco.

review.title: Right in the middle of things to do!
review.reviewText: Very quiet area, not a lot of shopping or food places around this hotel but close enough to everything.  We went downtown S.F, drove to Yosemite and Monterey, took in an A's game and did the S.F. Zoo, mall not too far away for dinner and a movie...overall was great location
review.positiveRemarks: centrally located for things we wanted to do....that close to 101 was very helpful.  only minutes from airport but didn't have to listen to them
review.negativeRemarks: We had some very noisy neighbors with little kids...wish there was a little bit more sound insulation between rooms
review.locationRemarks: We hit Fisherman's Wharf, Pier 39, Golden Gate Bridge, S.F Zoo, Baseball park, drove to Yosemite and Monterey....right by main highway

review.title: Ok
review.reviewText:
The hotel was ok, the rooms were smaller than you'd expect for an all suite hotel and the walls are THIN. I mean we could hear everything. The people next door had their radio on and we hear every beat of the song... Anytime someone came down the hall we could hear it... And anytime someone else's door was opened it sounded like someone was coming in our room so I was woken up a few times thinking someone was trying to get in our room. The room was decently clean. Breakfast was a bit of a nightmare- very small room for the number of guests and no order to the lines or way things are set up so you were constantly in the way of someone and being pushed around. Even though it was quite chilly that morning we braved the outdoor area just to get out of the dining room. The pool is very small and every time we went to go swim it was so crowded we couldn't get in. Might've just been an extra busy weekend but we were bummed we couldn't take advantage of that. 

Our dealings with the front desk were always pleasant and the location of the hotel was nice. We took a walk at the marina across the street and it was very peaceful and beautiful. I'd recommend if you got a really good deal, nothing to write home about though.

review.title: Good location, well kept, but small.
review.reviewText: We have stayed in Homewood Suites in many states and expected the facility to be like the others.  This hotel was OK, but the suite felt smaller than represented on the photos. The kitchen in particular was so small you could not open the dishwasher door fully - or the fridge door, either.  They banged into each other - not enough floor space between them.
review.negativeRemarks: Redo position of fridge, so it would open fully.
review.locationRemarks: Near the airport. Very good restaurants in the area.

review.reviewText: The hotel staff were very helpful and friendly. The continental breakfast was delicious and they're currently offering complimentary dinner from Monday to Thursday too!

review.title: The staff made the stay
review.reviewText:
The hotel staff, specifically Fred, were great.
Any request we had was promptly actioned.  
Great breakfast buffet.
review.positiveRemarks: The staff and the food available at breakfast / evening appetizers.
review.negativeRemarks: If they had an "on site" car rental outlet, it would be great to combine the hotel booking with a car rental....because you need a car when here.
review.locationRemarks: Removed from the tourists spots...but we had nice evening walks along the adjacent trail to the 'adult workout station' just north of the hotel.

review.title: Not too close to the airport, very close to SF!
review.reviewText:
We had a lovely stay at Homewood Suites.  I didn't have to cook ONCE because there was breakfast every morning and "dinner" almost every night - not Friday to Sunday.  Javier was also generous with the wine and beer!  The eggs weren't the best, but they were palatable.  I am gluten & cheese intolerant; and, I could find something to eat.

We only had a few "issues".  The biggest was that our toilet kept clogging.  However, the problem was solved only minutes after each report - it happened three times.  Every front desk person I encountered was attentive and professional.  The other was that our room was so close to the exit ramp to the highway.  It was fine for 6 of the 7 nights, but on our first night a cop pulled someone over using a megaphone at 3 am!  (Not the Hotel's fault, but the proximity did not help.)  There was no view from this side of the hotel, but we weren't there to see SF from the room.

TIP: There is parking at the corner of Jones and Beach near Fisherman's Wharf for $10.75 IF you get there before 10am!!
review.positiveRemarks: I loved breakfast every morning and the dinner reception every Monday-Thursday.  It saved time and money.  Also, the bed was hard but comfy enough!
review.negativeRemarks: There needs to be more seating for dining.
review.locationRemarks: This hotel is VERY close to San Francisco.  15 minutes without traffic, but we also hit traffic which took 30 plus minutes.

review.title: Nice Hotel but far from stores and dining
review.reviewText: Great services from Maids...Breakfast was good...but ran out one day....friendly staff
review.positiveRemarks: clean comfort and up to date....Need a car to stay there..and the walking around marina was beautiful
review.locationRemarks: not much only Marina which was lovely...the walking grounds were really nice and people were friendly

review.reviewText: sound insulation is terrible.  can hear upstair footsteps.  but worst part is can hear closely traffic noise.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know how we are doing as a hotel and staff.  We strive to be the best in the business at what we do and are very excited to see we were able to accomplish this during your recent stay in San Francisco.  We are currently undergoing upgrades to the property and would love to have you back in the future to see the finished product.

review.reviewText: Good, staff is friendly. No issues at all. everything is as expected and advertised.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know how we are doing as a hotel.  I apologize for the issues you had during your stay.  I have taken the comments you left to the staff and we will do everything to fix the issues.  I am happy to hear that you were pleased with our breakfast and room.  We are currently undergoing upgrades to the property and would like to have you back so you are able to see the finished product.

review.title: Very thin walls
review.reviewText: We were 3 doors down from the elevator and could hear the dings and the doors opening . Also, the beds are so in need of being upgraded or replaced. Way too soft and mushy. Othewise, very nice room and breakfast is excellent.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay in the hotel.  I apologize that you had a bad experience at the property during your final day.  We strive to be the best in the business but I can see we fell short during your recent stay in the area.  I have brought the comments to the staff and we will do everything we can to insure this does not happen in the future.  We are currently undergoing upgrades to the property and would love to have you back in the future to see the finished product.

review.reviewText: I went for a night. Hotel was okay my friend told me about it. I was about to leave just looking for the car keys at 12 noon they knock saying if we were on our way out. Which that I found rude. I was on my way out we just had misplaced the keys

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know how we are doing as a hotel.  We are very excited to see that we were able to help make you stay great in San Francisco.  We strive to be the best in the business and are very pleased to see we were able to do this for you.  We are currently undergoing upgrades to the property and would love to see you back in the future so you are able to see the finished product.

review.title: Great location, close to airport and main freeway.
review.reviewText: Great hotel, would stay again. Complimentary breakfast and suppers during the week!! Free shuttle to airport.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to give your feed back about your recent stay in San Francisco at the Homewood Suites.  I am very please to see we were able to make your stay a positive one.  We strive to be the best in the business at what we do and are very please to see that we were able to accomplish this for you.  We are currently  undergoing upgrades to the property and would love to see you in the future to show you the finished product.

review.title: Quite Surprised!
review.reviewText: I knew hotel was being remodeled, so I went in not expecting much. Found one elevator out of service due to renovation, but I was content waiting for the second elevator as I enjoyed some complimentary coffee. Two bedroom suite was spacious and clean. Sofa bed needs new mattress though. Breakfast was great and had a variety of hot and cold choices. Will definitely stay here again!

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know how we are doing as a hotel.  We strive to be the best in the business at what we do.  I am very please to see that your stay was a very good one.  I apologize that breakfast was the same everyday, we are currently looking at options to upgrade our breakfast offerings.  We are currently undergoing upgrades to the property and would love to see you in the future to see the finished product.

review.title: Quiet location., close to the beach, clean room, .
review.reviewText: I really like this hotel , the rooms are very spacious . The breakfast buffet is always the same everyday. But overall is very good .
review.negativeRemarks: The breakfast buffet is always the same food everyday

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know how we are doing, both as a hotel and staff.  I am very please to hear that the gentleman were FANTASTIC during your stay.  I will be bringing your comments to the staff so they can see the great things said about them.  As you know we are currently undergoing upgrades to the property and would love to see you and your family in the future to see the finished product.

review.title: Pre-Flight Hotel Stay
review.reviewText: The hotel is showing signs of wear, and the beds were decent, but the pillows a little flat. We had a 2 bedroom suite and the pull out couch did not have linens, but the staff was awesome and had them to us right away. The breakfast was excellent, and the two gentleman the were helping in the breakfast room were FANTASTIC!!!! When you travel with a family the includes 2 small children and 3 generations you need a little extra and these two helped carry plates, cleaned up after the kids and made sure we had everything we needed. All of the staff were helpful and very pleasant.
review.positiveRemarks: Convenience, the staff and the quality of the breakfast.
review.locationRemarks: Great hotel to stay in before flying out of SFO
